languages.text: "Могучей владычицей культа была Сирлаэль, почитаемой и смертоносной! Танец битвы ее был совершенен, чарующ и ужасен! Но настал час, и дерзкая ученица свергла Сирлаэль, обратила слуг ее против нее и прогнала прочь из Темного города".

"Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."
languages.original_text: "Могучей владычицей культа была Сирлаэль, почитаемой и смертоносной! Танец битвы ее был совершенен, чарующ и ужасен! Но настал час, и дерзкая ученица свергла Сирлаэль, обратила слуг ее против нее и прогнала прочь из Темного города".

"Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."

languages.text: « Sirlael était une guerrière du culte, célèbre et redoutée ! La perfection de sa danse de combat hypnotisait et terrifiait toutes ses victimes, sans exception ! Mais un jour, son audacieuse apprentie la supplanta, retourna ses serviteurs contre et elle la bannit de la Cité Crépusculaire. »
languages.original_text: "Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: « Sirlael était une guerrière du culte, célèbre et redoutée ! La perfection de sa danse de combat hypnotisait et terrifiait toutes ses victimes, sans exception ! Mais un jour, son audacieuse apprentie la supplanta, retourna ses serviteurs contre et elle la bannit de la Cité Crépusculaire. »

languages.text: “希蕾尔是位强大的战士，效忠于她的巫灵教派。她声明远扬，无比凶狠！她的战斗之舞更是完美无瑕，令人着迷！但后来，某个胆大包天的学徒煽动她的仆人反对她，将她逐出了黑暗之城，取代了她的位置。”
languages.original_text: "Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: “希蕾尔是位强大的战士，效忠于她的巫灵教派。她声明远扬，无比凶狠！她的战斗之舞更是完美无瑕，令人着迷！但后来，某个胆大包天的学徒煽动她的仆人反对她，将她逐出了黑暗之城，取代了她的位置。”

languages.text: 「サーラエルは強さと恐ろしさで知られた魔女団の戦士だった！彼女の戦いのダンスは魅惑的で、完成された恐怖だった！しかしある時、大胆不適な弟子がサーラエルに取って代わり、彼女の従者たちを反逆させた。そして仄暗き都から彼女を追い払ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: 「サーラエルは強さと恐ろしさで知られた魔女団の戦士だった！彼女の戦いのダンスは魅惑的で、完成された恐怖だった！しかしある時、大胆不適な弟子がサーラエルに取って代わり、彼女の従者たちを反逆させた。そして仄暗き都から彼女を追い払ったのだ」

languages.text: "Sirlael war eine mächtige Kriegerin ihres Kults, so berüchtigt wie tödlich! Sie beherrschte den Tanz ihres Kampfes in erschreckender Perfektion! Doch dann kam eine Zeit, in der Sirlael von einer verwegenen Schülerin verdrängt wurde. Die Schülerin brachte ihre Diener gegen sie auf und sorgte dafür, dass sie aus der Dunklen Stadt vertrieben wurde."
languages.original_text: "Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Sirlael war eine mächtige Kriegerin ihres Kults, so berüchtigt wie tödlich! Sie beherrschte den Tanz ihres Kampfes in erschreckender Perfektion! Doch dann kam eine Zeit, in der Sirlael von einer verwegenen Schülerin verdrängt wurde. Die Schülerin brachte ihre Diener gegen sie auf und sorgte dafür, dass sie aus der Dunklen Stadt vertrieben wurde."

languages.text: «Sirlael era una poderosa guerrera de su culto, tan célebre como letal! ¡Danzaba en combate con una perfección fascinante y terrorífica! Pero llegó un día en que una osada aprendiz usurpó el puesto de Sirlael, volvió a sus sirvientes contra ella y la expulsó de la Ciudad Siniestra».
languages.original_text: "Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: «Sirlael era una poderosa guerrera de su culto, tan célebre como letal! ¡Danzaba en combate con una perfección fascinante y terrorífica! Pero llegó un día en que una osada aprendiz usurpó el puesto de Sirlael, volvió a sus sirvientes contra ella y la expulsó de la Ciudad Siniestra».

languages.text: "Sirlael, Tarikat'ın kudretli savaşçılarındandı. Adını bilmeyen olmadığı gibi ölümcüllüğüyle de ünlüydü. Savaş dansı, kusursuz dehşetiyle insanları mest ederdi! Ancak günün birinde cüretkâr bir çırak, Sirlael'in ayağını kaydırdı. Hizmetkârları Sirlael'e karşı ayaklanıp onu Kara Şehir'den sürdü."
languages.original_text: "Sirlael was a mighty warrior of her Cult, renowned and deadly! Her dance of battle was an entrancing perfection of terror! But then a time came when an audacious apprentice supplanted Sirlael, turned her servants against her, and drove her out of the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Sirlael, Tarikat'ın kudretli savaşçılarındandı. Adını bilmeyen olmadığı gibi ölümcüllüğüyle de ünlüydü. Savaş dansı, kusursuz dehşetiyle insanları mest ederdi! Ancak günün birinde cüretkâr bir çırak, Sirlael'in ayağını kaydırdı. Hizmetkârları Sirlael'e karşı ayaklanıp onu Kara Şehir'den sürdü."
